pr_title: [BEAM-10556] Move rawtype error suppression to class level

timeline.message: Add class-level suppression of rawtypes errors

timeline.bodyText: There are a number of changes like this that I did just to make it more sane to automatically add the rawtype warnings. I can revert if you like or separate into another commit.
timeline.author: kennknowles
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -121,7 +121,9 @@ *

The example will try to cancel the pipelines on the signal to terminate the process (CTRL-C) * and then exits. */ -@SuppressWarnings("nullness") // TODO(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-10402) +@SuppressWarnings({ + "nullness" // TODO(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-10402)

replies.bodyText: SG. It's a mechanical change so no problem leaving it in this commit.
replies.author: tysonjh
